    • Uses of FederationPolicyInitializationException in org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies.manager

      Methods in org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies.manager that throw FederationPolicyInitializationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FederationAMRMProxyPolicy FederationPolicyManager.getAMRMPolicy(FederationPolicyInitializationContext policyContext, FederationAMRMProxyPolicy oldInstance)
      If the current instance is compatible, this method returns the same instance of FederationAMRMProxyPolicy reinitialized with the current context, otherwise a new instance initialized with the current context is provided.
      FederationAMRMProxyPolicy AbstractPolicyManager.getAMRMPolicy(FederationPolicyInitializationContext federationPolicyContext, FederationAMRMProxyPolicy oldInstance)
      This default implementation validates the FederationPolicyInitializationContext, then checks whether it needs to reinstantiate the class (null or mismatching type), and reinitialize the policy.
      FederationRouterPolicy FederationPolicyManager.getRouterPolicy(FederationPolicyInitializationContext policyContext, FederationRouterPolicy oldInstance)
      If the current instance is compatible, this method returns the same instance of FederationRouterPolicy reinitialized with the current context, otherwise a new instance initialized with the current context is provided.
      FederationRouterPolicy AbstractPolicyManager.getRouterPolicy(FederationPolicyInitializationContext federationPolicyContext, FederationRouterPolicy oldInstance)
      This default implementation validates the FederationPolicyInitializationContext, then checks whether it needs to reinstantiate the class (null or mismatching type), and reinitialize the policy.
      SubClusterPolicyConfiguration WeightedLocalityPolicyManager.serializeConf() 
      SubClusterPolicyConfiguration FederationPolicyManager.serializeConf()
      This method is invoked to derive a SubClusterPolicyConfiguration.
      SubClusterPolicyConfiguration AbstractPolicyManager.serializeConf() 
      SubClusterPolicyConfiguration PriorityBroadcastPolicyManager.serializeConf()
